content.question: Are Nativis products 100% natural?
content.answer: Yes, all Nativis products are made from 100% natural ingredients. We use neem as our base ingredient and combine it with other carefully selected natural components. We do not use any synthetic chemicals, artificial fragrances, or preservatives in our formulations.

content.question: Why is neem the primary ingredient in your products?
content.answer: Neem is renowned in traditional medicine for its numerous benefits. It has natural antibacterial, anti-inflammatory, and antioxidant properties. These qualities make it excellent for skin and hair care, helping to soothe, nourish, and protect. We've made neem our star ingredient because of its versatility and effectiveness across our product range.

content.question: Are Nativis products suitable for all skin types?
content.answer: Our products are formulated to be gentle and suitable for most skin types, including sensitive skin. However, as everyone's skin is unique, we recommend doing a patch test before using any new product, especially if you have known allergies or very sensitive skin.

content.question: Are your products cruelty-free and vegan?
content.answer: Absolutely. Nativis is committed to ethical practices. All our products are cruelty-free - we never test on animals. Most of our products are also vegan, but please check individual product descriptions for specific information, as some may contain ingredients like beeswax or honey.

content.question: How long do Nativis products typically last?
content.answer: The shelf life of our products varies depending on the specific item, but generally ranges from 12 to 24 months when unopened. Once opened, we recommend using the product within 6 to 12 months for optimal effectiveness. Each product is labeled with a Period After Opening (PAO) symbol indicating how long it remains safe to use after first opening.
